metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0409 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In create of FileMap.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an integer overflow. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9Android ID: A-156997193

criterions.comment: android-platform-system-core package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
